entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
